entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023
